```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame([('falcon', 'bird', 389.0),
...                    ('parrot', 'bird', 24.0),
...                    ('lion', 'mammal', 80.5),
...                    ('monkey', 'mammal', np.nan),
...                    ('rabbit', 'mammal', 15.0)],
...                   columns=['name', 'class', 'max_speed'],
...                   index=[4, 3, 2, 1, 0])
>>> df
 name   class  max_speed
4  falcon    bird      389.0
3  parrot    bird       24.0
2    lion  mammal       80.5
1  monkey  mammal        NaN
0  rabbit  mammal       15.0
>>> gb = df.groupby([1, 1, 2, 2, 2]) 
```

```py
>>> gb.take([0, 1])
 name   class  max_speed
1 4  falcon    bird      389.0
 3  parrot    bird       24.0
2 2    lion  mammal       80.5
 1  monkey  mammal        NaN 
```

```py
>>> gb.take([1, 0])
 name   class  max_speed
1 3  parrot    bird       24.0
 4  falcon    bird      389.0
2 1  monkey  mammal        NaN
 2    lion  mammal       80.5 
```

```py
>>> gb.take([-1, -2])
 name   class  max_speed
1 3  parrot    bird       24.0
 4  falcon    bird      389.0
2 0  rabbit  mammal       15.0
 1  monkey  mammal        NaN 
```
